Class JmeImGuiDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tianscar.jme3.imgui.JmeImGuiDelegate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JmeGlfwImGui

    public abstract class JmeImGuiDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
    The delegate class to working with ImGui.

      • init

                          java.lang.Runnable beforeInit)
        Method to initialize ImGui.
        Parameters:
        context - the JmeContext
        beforeInit - an interface for load additional ImGui settings

      • refreshFontTexture

        public abstract void refreshFontTexture()
        Method to load generated font textures to GL.

      • startFrame

        public abstract void startFrame()
        Method called at the beginning of the main cycle. It starts a new ImGui frame.

      • endFrame

        public abstract void endFrame()
        Method called in the end of the main cycle. It renders ImGui to prepare an updated frame.

      • dispose

        public abstract void dispose()
        Method to dispose all used ImGui resources.
